actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Committee consideration and Mark Up Session held.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Chafee with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 104-291.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 458.

official_title: A bill to expand the Pettaquamscutt Cove National Wildlife Refuge, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire for addition to the Pettaquamscutt Cove National Wildlife Refuge: (1) an area in Rhode Island known as Foddering Farms Acres; and (2) such lands, waters, and interests therein as the Secretary considers appropriate. Provides for boundary revisions.

titles.title: A bill to expand the Pettaquamscutt Cove National Wildlife Refuge, and for other purposes.
